article_title: Police Investigate Fatal Shooting In Revere
article_text:
Updated January 23, 2015, 11:43 am

A young man has been fatally shot in Revere.

Officers responded to a car on Garfield Avenue just after 2 a.m. Friday and found the man slumped over in the driver’s seat.

He was described as an 18-year-old Chelsea resident, but his name has not been released.

There was no word on arrests, but police say the shooting does not appear to be random.

No other information was immediately available.
